email.subject: Account creation confirmation
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your account has just been created. Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: Renewal of password
email.content:
Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name],
Somebody has asked a renewal of password for your account.
To renew your password, click on this link : [forgot_password_link].
If you are not at the origin of this request, please ignore this message.
email.description: Send to customer a link to renew its password

email.subject: Order payment confirmation (Paypal id [paypal_order_key])
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your payment about your recent order on our website has been completed (order date : [order_date]). Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: Pay and finalize your order
email.content:
Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name],
An order is available for you on our website.
You can click on this link to pay and finalize this order : [direct_payment_link]
[order_content]
Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.
email.description: Send a link for finalize its order directly

email.subject: Your payment has been received
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your payment regarding your order ([order_key]) has just been received (order date : [order_date]). Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: Your order has been shipped
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your order ([order_key]) has just been shipped (order date : [order_date], tracking number : [order_trackingNumber]). Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: Your order has been recorded
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your order has been recorded (order date : [order_date]). Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: Your order has been updated
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], your order ([order_key]) has just been updated. Please login to your account to view details. Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.
email.description: Notify a customer when order is updated

email.subject: Your order has been canceled
email.content:
Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name],
this email confirms your order ( Order key : [order_key] - Date : [order_date] ) has been canceled.
Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.
email.description: Notify a customer when order is canceled

email.subject: A comment has been added to your order
email.content:
Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], your order ([order_key]) has just been updated. A comment has been added:
[message].
Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.

email.subject: New order on your shop
email.content: Hello, New order on your shop ! Order Key : [order_key], Order date : [order_date], Order payment method : [order_payment_method], [order_content] [order_addresses] [order_customer_comments]
email.description: New order on shop sended to shop administrator

email.subject: New WPShop version [wpshop_version]
email.content: Hello, WPShop goes to [wpshop_version] ! An update is available in your WordPress administration.
email.description: New version of WPShop sended to shop administrator

email.subject: New quotation on your shop
email.content: Hello, New quotation on your shop ! Quotation Key : [order_temporary_key], Quotation date : [order_date], [order_content] [order_addresses] [order_customer_comments]
email.description: New quotation on shop sended to shop administrator

email.subject: Your quotation has been recorded
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your order has been recorded (Quotation date : [order_date]). [order_content]

email.subject: Your quotation has been updated
email.content: Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name], this email confirms that your quotation has been updated (Quotation date : [order_date]). [order_content]
email.description: Notify a customer when quotation is updated

email.subject: Your downloadable product is available
email.content:
Hello [customer_first_name] [customer_last_name],
this email confirms that your downloadable product is available : [download_product_link].
Thank you for your loyalty. Have a good day.
email.description: Notify a customer when downloadable file is available after an order
